cmd-resetplaylist-response: The server's autoplaylist has been reset.
cmd-help-no-perms: You don't have permission to use any commands. Type `{}help all` to list every command anyway.
cmd-help-response:
For information about a particular command, type `{0}help [command]`.

For information on DJ Roomba, type `{1}botinfo`.
cmd-help-all: I am only showing commands you can use. For a list of all commands, type `{}help all`.
cmd-blacklist-invalid: Invalid option '{0}' specified, use +, -, add, or remove.
cmd-blacklist-added: `{0}` users have been added to the blacklist.
cmd-blacklist-none: None of those users are in the blacklist.
cmd-blacklist-removed: `{0}` users have been removed from the blacklist.
cmd-save-exists: This song is already in the autoplaylist.
cmd-save-invalid: There is no valid song playing.
cmd-joinserver-response:
Click here to add me to a server: 
{}
cmd-play-spotify-album-process: I am processing album **{0}**. This may take a while depending on the size of the album. Please wait before shuffling ...
cmd-play-spotify-album-queued: I have queued the album **{0}** with **{1}** songs.
cmd-play-spotify-playlist-process: Processing playlist **{0}**. This may take a while depending on the size of the playlist. Please wait before shuffling ...
cmd-play-spotify-playlist-queued: I have queued the playlist **{0}** with **{1}** songs.
cmd-play-spotify-unsupported: That is not a supported Spotify URI. Please right click the item in Spotify, select `Share`, then select `Copy Spotify URI`. Paste that info after the play command.
cmd-play-spotify-invalid: You either provided an invalid URI or an unknown problem occurred. Please make sure to right click the item in Spotify, select `Share`, then select `Copy Spotify URI`.
cmd-play-spotify-unavailable: I am not configured to support Spotify URIs at the moment.
cmd-play-limit: You have reached your enqueued song limit ({0}).
cmd-play-noinfo: That video cannot be played. Try using the `{0}stream` command.
cmd-play-nodata: Error extracting info from search string, youtubedl returned no data. You may need to restart the bot if this continues to happen.
cmd-play-playlist-maxduration: No songs were added, all songs were over max duration (%ss).
cmd-play-playlist-reply: Enqueued **%s** songs to be played. Position in queue: **%s**.
cmd-play-playlist-process: Processing **{0}** songs - this can take a while for large playlists. Please wait before shuffling ...
cmd-play-playlist-skipped: Additionally, the current song was skipped for being too long ...
cmd-play-playlist-reply-secs: Enqueued **{0}** songs to be played in **{1}** seconds. Type `{2}shuffle` to shuffle the queue.
cmd-play-song-reply: Enqueued **%s** to be played. Position in queue: **%s**.
cmd-play-badextractor: Sorry, you do not have permission to play media from this service ...
cmd-stream-limit: You have reached your enqueued song limit ({0}).
cmd-stream-success: Got it! Your stream has been added to the queue. To end the stream use the skip command.
cmd-search-limit: You have reached your playlist item limit ({0}).
cmd-search-noquote: Please quote your search query properly ...
cmd-search-searchlimit: You cannot search for more than %s videos.
cmd-search-searching: Searching for videos ... make your choice by choosing a reaction under the search result.
cmd-search-none: I couldn't find any videos using your search query. Try another ...
cmd-search-accept: Excellent. Your song has been added to the queue.
cmd-search-decline: If I didn't find what you were looking for try again using a slightly different search query.
cmd-np-none: There are no songs queued. Queue something with `{0}play`.
cmd-summon-novc: You must be in a voice channel to summon me.
cmd-summon-noperms-connect: I cannot join channel **{0}** because I don't have permission to connect.
cmd-summon-noperms-speak: I cannot join channel **{0}** because I don't have permission to speak.
cmd-summon-reply: Hi there! I am now connected to `{0.name}` on `{1.name}`. Please type `{2}help` to learn more about what I can do.
cmd-pause-reply: The current song and queue are now paused in `{0.name}`. Type {1}resume to resume playing.
cmd-pause-none: I am currently not playing anything.
cmd-resume-reply: The current song and queue have now resumed playing in `{0.name}`.
cmd-resume-none: I am not paused. If I am not playing anything the queue is probably empty.
cmd-shuffle-reply: I have shuffled the queue in `{0}`.
cmd-clear-reply: I have cleared the queue in `{0}`.
cmd-remove-none: There's nothing in the queue to remove.
cmd-remove-reply: I have removed **{0}** which was added by **{1}**.
cmd-remove-missing: I couldn't find anything in the queue added by **%s**.
cmd-remove-noperms: You do not have the valid permissions to remove that entry from the queue. Make sure you're the one who queued it or have instant skip permissions.
cmd-remove-invalid: Invalid number. Use `{}queue` to find queue positions.
cmd-skip-none: I cannot skip because I am not playing anything.
cmd-skip-dl: The next song (**%s**) is downloading, please wait ...
cmd-skip-force-noperms: Sorry, but you do not have permission to force skip ...
cmd-skip-reply-voted-1:
Your skip for **{0}** was acknowledged.
**{1}** more {2} required to vote to skip this song.
cmd-volume-unreasonable-relative: Unreasonable volume change provided: {}{:+} -> {}%. Please provide a change between {} and {:+}.
cmd-volume-unreasonable-absolute: Unreasonable volume provided: `{}%`. Please provide a value between `1` and `100`.
cmd-option-autoplaylist-none: There are currently no entries in the autoplaylist
cmd-option-invalid-value: Sorry, but the value provided was not valid ...
cmd-option-invalid-param: Sorry, but the parameters provided were invalid ...
cmd-queue-none: There are currently no songs queued. Queue something with `{}play`.
cmd-clean-invalid: Invalid parameter. Please provide a number of messages to search ...
playlists-noperms: You are not allowed to request playlists.
playlists-limit: Playlist entries + your already queued songs reached limit ({0} + {1} > {2}).
karaoke-enabled: Karaoke mode is currently enabled. Please try again when its disabled.
